comment.author: Kayla
comment.text: Fact: The only party who is organized enough to take on the republicans are the Democrats. Independents are organizationally challenged.

replies.author: Anthony
replies.text: Would that be because your party teamed up with republicans to boot the league of women voters from hosting presidential debates? Oh yeah!!! Republicans and Democrats are on the same team! The $ Team!

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: Anthony You don't know what you're talking about. Democrats and League of Women Voters often work together. Often have the SAME MEMBERS!

replies.author: Cristi
replies.text: As a former President in Lake Co, I can attest to that fact. Geez...Kayla, do you have a contact in Volusia (DeLand). I will be there Thurs-Early Sunday and want to help GOTV in between Homecoming events.
